autumn.lang.compiler

Class AutumnCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.compiler.AutumnCompiler

  • public final class AutumnCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class is a compiler that can compile Autumn modules.

    You should not use this class directly. Instead, use it indirectly via the Autumn class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AutumnCompiler(IErrorReporter reporter, java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImport(java.lang.Class klass)
      This method specifies that a particular class should be imported in every module.
      CompiledProgram compile(java.lang.Iterable<Module> modules)
      This method compiles the abstract-syntax-tree representations of a group of modules.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutumnCompiler

        public AutumnCompiler(IErrorReporter reporter,
              java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        reporter - is the error-reporter used to report compilation-errors.
        loader - is the class-loader used to find types that were already loaded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if reporter is null.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if loader is null.

    • Method Detail

      • addImport

        public void addImport(java.lang.Class klass)
        This method specifies that a particular class should be imported in every module.
        Parameters:
        klass - is the type to import in every module automatically.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if klass is null.

      • compile

        public CompiledProgram compile(java.lang.Iterable<Module> modules)
        This method compiles the abstract-syntax-tree representations of a group of modules.
        Parameters:
        modules - are the modules that will be compiled.
        Returns:
        the compiled program that results from compiling the modules, or null, if the program could not be compiled.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if modules is null.
